pullRequest.title: Remove ping from tests to avoid failures on azp
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Jakub Stejskal xstejs24@gmail.com
Type of change

Bugfix

Description
This PR removes ping from several tests, because ping outside of the internal network is not allowed on azure pipelines infra.
Checklist

 Make sure all tests pass

commit.message:
Skip tests for host alliases on azp

nodes.bodyText: Should these be in some abstract class or somewhere once instead of being in any file?
Should the string you look for e defined next to the alias IP and hostname?
Sorry that I'm reviewing this, but can you please remove the Matchers? It's leftover from my PR...
